full_summary:
**Standing Offer for Bulk Road Salt**
=====================================

**Procurement Reference Number**
--------------------------------
WS4207277943-Doc4207363556

**Publication Date**
-------------------
2023-09-12

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------
2023-09-27T14:00:00

**Notice Type**
----------------
Request for Standing Offer

**Procurement Category**
------------------------
Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method**
----------------------
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Brief Description**
-----------------
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of Federal Departments and Agencies, is issuing a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the acquisition of bulk road salt, including delivery, for regions located in Quebec.

**Deliveries**
-------------
Deliveries will be made to the following regions:

* Farnham
* Joliette
* Donnacona
* Lévis
* Quebec
* Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue
* Drummondville
* Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
* Montreal

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------
This tender is covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Key Dates**
----------------

* Publication date: 2023-09-12
* Tender closing date: 2023-09-27T14:00:00

**Contact Information**
----------------------

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact Annie Blanchet, SPAC/PSPC, at annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
